headline: Realty Income Extends Beyond Net Lease Roots With Mexico And Fees
summary: Realty Income (NYSE:O) announced a US$200 million acquisition of industrial assets in Mexico, marking its entry into a new geographic market. The company plans to launch an asset management business in 2026 aimed at institutional investors, with a focus on fee-based income. These moves extend Realty Income beyond its traditional net lease retail focus and monthly dividend model. Realty Income, known for its net lease retail properties and monthly dividends, is now adding industrial exposure...
